delay: Shipment delayed due to heavy traffic
Loading process taking longer than expected
damage: Package shows signs of external damage
route-deviation: Driver had to take alternate route due to road closure
GPS routing error caused deviation from planned route
Unplanned detour due to traffic conditions
weather: Severe weather warning in delivery area

low: Minor delay expected, no significant impact on delivery timeframe
Issue can be resolved within normal operations
medium: Delivery likely to be delayed by 1-2 days
high: Will impact downstream supply chain operations
critical: Shipment at risk of cancellation or severe delay
Major financial impact and potential penalties

delay: Expedited shipping arranged at no additional cost
Priority handling flagged at next checkpoint
Delivery time window extended with customer approval
damage: Product inspection scheduled at next checkpoint
Damage assessment team dispatched to location
route-deviation: Routing optimization performed to minimize impact
Driver provided with updated navigation instructions
Traffic monitoring activated to avoid further delays
Alternate route calculated with estimated time adjustment
weather: Shipment rerouted to avoid weather system
Hold placed until weather conditions improve
mechanical: Maintenance team dispatched to vehicle location
Local service provider engaged for quick repairs
Towing service arranged to nearest service center
administrative: Temporary exemption granted with follow-up required
